Posts.Content: Hi all, I visited the doctor the other day as I've had a sore itchy breast will changes around the nipple area.  She examined me and found a lump. Shes referred me to breast clinic and I have appointment in two weeks.  Is a two week referral seen as urgent? I've also had a the appointment letter which says general surgery breast clinic kind of worried when I seen the word surgery. It also says I'm my appt is with a surgeon does that usually happen on the first appt I was under the impression I would be seeing a nurse. Thanks in advance
Posts.Title: Worried breast lump

Posts.Content: HI Julia  sorry i didn't realise. Thanks for your advice, I Think I am overthinking everything to be honest, just worrying so much.  THanks again xx
Posts.Title: Worried breast lump
